website_summaries.verdict: Designed to stand up to an outdoors environment, this 20-foot cord is a good option for corded outdoor power tools or other devices intended for outdoor use.
pros: The vinyl casing offers protection from outdoor elements including rain, wind, dirt, and debris
Since outdoor extension cables are often used with corded power tools and exterior lights, the 20 feet provided by this cord can meet those needs
Reinforced casing to prevent accidental bending or breaking
cons: Like many outdoor extension cables, the casing on this product contains lead, and indoor use should be avoided

customer_reviews.title: Great extension cord.
customer_reviews.text: Needed this to run from my UPS to my TV mounted above the mantle. Works well so far. I would not recommend this one for someone who will be moving it frequently as it does contain lead. Mine is run through conduit in a wall so no worries for me. Be sure to wash your hands after handling it.
customer_reviews.author: TTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Standard extension cord that I used last year in my Christmas lights display last year. I had no issues with it while connected to my light display. I have been using the cord with my electric fire starter in my smoker all spring / summer and the cord works as expected. The fire starter is a heating element that reaches temperatures over 1000 F and pulls a lot of current, if you were going to have issues with an electoral cord this would be the device to find it with.
customer_reviews.author: lance frazier

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to splice into a fan for my garage so I could plug it into an outlet. I put up a fan and there wasn't a fan or light fixture wiring so I had to improvise. Probably isn't the safest thing but it worked great and the fan has been running with no issues for about a month now.
customer_reviews.author: ScottTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor extension cord
customer_reviews.text: Great extension cord. This length is just what I needed to connect my weed eater to my extra heavy duty outdoor extension cord (the kind with three outlets so can't be plugged directly into the weed eater). I've already used it outside several times and it worked very well. I wasn't sure about getting it in the white color, but this actually turned out to be perfect for weed-eating. I can always easily see where the cord is in the grass and won't accidentally damage it. I haven't had any problems with it whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Timely shipment
customer_reviews.text: It is an extension cord and it is not black. That is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Raleigh

customer_reviews.title: No unicorns?
customer_reviews.text: It's an extension cord. It extended the power as expected. Does not create manically unicorns as I'd hoped, but I am satisfied. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Nice and strong
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I purchased this because my house is white and I wanted to run the extension cord to a timer controlled insect light without having it show too much.
customer_reviews.author: Donna N

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my dad. Needed white ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my dad. Needed white outdoor cords for light colored houses for hanging holiday lights. Most stores only have the green or brown exterior ones!
customer_reviews.author: A. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: It's an electrical cord, need I say more?
customer_reviews.text: It works, was cheap, and not horrible orange Build quality isn't noticeably deficient, not super heavy duty, but just like every other extension cord that I have used.
customer_reviews.author: C Wiseman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality cord in white. Hard combination and this one does it well.
customer_reviews.author: good or not

customer_reviews.title: Good for running along white soffit or trim for outside lights
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for installing outside Christmas lights. Had to run an extension cord along white soffit & wanted it to blend in & not be an eye sore. Worked perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Good, heavy duty extension cord.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. 16 gauge wire. Weather resistant. Blends in better than the dark green cord I was using. Wife is happier.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond W Price

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Just great so far. It's outside so we'll see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Insufficient Funds

customer_reviews.title: Nice indoor extension cord
customer_reviews.text: Nice indoor extension cord. Currently using in a bedroom for a lamp. Being white, it goes along nicely with the baseboards and doesn't noticeably stick out.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and what you would expect.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good. Just as I expected. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: MichiganTraveler

customer_reviews.title: Its a great cord
customer_reviews.text: It may be for outdoors but I am using it indoors because it matches the color of the wall where I am going to extend my WiFi router with and extender.
customer_reviews.author: AT WHIT'S ENDE

customer_reviews.title: It blends with my house paint and is the perfect length. Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Such a practical item was found at Amazon and then received within a couple of days. I use this to light my twinkle lights on my patio. It blends with my house paint and is the perfect length. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A

customer_reviews.title: Whelp as far as cords go...
customer_reviews.text: This one looked a bit shady to me at first but when it arrived very quickly (which surprised me) I was very pleased to find it was eactly what i wanted, expected and was very pleased as this length is a bit sparce to find.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Gelf

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to extend my Photo booth and it worked, OK The cord was good quality and did what it was designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: AnthonyS66

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Great all weather extension cord. The white color is very pleasant and I am able to use it both indoors and out without a hitch. Very high quality and solidly constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Good chord when running in Snow for Christmas Displays .
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable shorter chord for outside light displays . I am pleased .
customer_reviews.author: Croppled1Top Contributor: Mountain Biking

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what you can review an extension cord on, but it seems to be working
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: I can roll over to left or right and still ...
customer_reviews.text: I can roll over to left or right and still use the phone with it plugged into the nightstand. So far durable.
customer_reviews.author: just another friendly person

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, will stay hooked up for years to come
customer_reviews.author: Tom Lafferty

customer_reviews.title: works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and is exactly what I need and want. works Great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: james witham

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cord
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, good quality outdoor extension cord. For use with Christmas lights you can't beat this cord.
customer_reviews.author: purdueboiler91

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good long extension. I fixed it over the door Good quality cable and plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Ozan K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this it ....! Works really great! Perfect for what we needed!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LONG ELECTRIC CORD
customer_reviews.text: JUST A LONG CORD FOR MY DELLA PORTABLE WASH & SPIN. IT DOES ITS JOB!
customer_reviews.author: Marah Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: solid quality
customer_reviews.text: Good solid cord. Used it all winter in the snow with no problems. Will use it next year too.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler M

customer_reviews.title: It's an extension cable
customer_reviews.text: I needed an extension cable so I could easily move my router to a better location, and this one did the trick. I have used Master Electrician products before and they all have a very good track record with me; this product lived up to the expectations I have come to expect from the brand. Its pretty affordable for the quality provided and I'd trust the brand for any future electrical products I need to purchase. Overall, this is a basic extension cord that is high quality and reasonably priced; a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Was Very Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Great Price and Fast Shipping, was Very Impressed when it Arrived the Next Day.
customer_reviews.author: JMIKULEC

customer_reviews.title: Solid white extension cable
customer_reviews.text: I bought the wrong size, but that's on me. Unless you really need a 20-footer, get the 30-footer. Pros: Well-built, connectors and cable are solid. Standard cord size. Cons: Too short for my application but that's my fault, not theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Castino

customer_reviews.title: Duh, it's a cord!
customer_reviews.text: It does what extension cords are supposed to do, is decent quality, and as a bonus, it does not stick out as bad as the typical orange/red varieties to.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy Blue

customer_reviews.title: It's a cord.
customer_reviews.text: This cord works fine and is as described. Thought I could get a bit better deal but this wasn't too bad. Been using for a few weeks and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Sean
